Trade/Device Name(s): VeriClear Digital Early Result Pregnancy Test
VeriClearTM Digital Early Result Pregnancy Test
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): VeriClear Digital Early Result Pregnancy Test (integrated device with digital reader)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VeriClear Digital Early Result Pregnancy Test, a qualitative chromatographic immunoassay for detection of hCG in urine with digital readout.
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid chromatographic immunoassay for qualitative detection of hCG in urine as an aid in early detection of pregnancy, in some cases as early as five days before the expected period; intended for over-the-counter use.
